mapper.select: SELECT p.POSTID , p.USERID , p.NICKNAME , p.FOODNAME , p.CONTENT , p.CREATEAT , p.UPDATEAT , p.ISDELETED , p.LOOKUP , i.INGREDIENT , i.AMOUNT FROM (select * from post where ISDELETED ='N') p INNER JOIN ingredient i ON p.POSTID = i.POSTID

SELECT
(select count(*) from POSTLIKE where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as likecnt , (select count(*) from POSTBOOKMARK where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as bookmarkcnt , (select count(*) from FOLLOWMAPPING where FWID=#{userId} and USERID=p2.USERID and ISDELETED='N') as followcnt ,
p2.POSTID , p2.USERID , p2.NICKNAME , p2.FOODNAME , p2.CONTENT , p2.CREATEAT , p2.UPDATEAT , p2.ISDELETED , p2.LOOKUP, i.INGREDIENT , i.AMOUNT, m.PROFILEURL FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM post WHERE
USERID=#{myPage} AND
USERID=#{othersPage} AND
ISDELETED = 'N' AND ISBLINDED ='N' ORDER BY postid ) p) WHERE RNUM> #{from} AND RNUM<=#{to}) p2 JOIN ingredient i ON p2.POSTID = i.POSTID JOIN members m ON p2.USERID = m.USERID

SELECT p.POSTID , p.USERID , p.NICKNAME , p.FOODNAME , p.CONTENT , p.CREATEAT , p.UPDATEAT , p.ISDELETED , p.LOOKUP , p.ISBLINDED , i.INGREDIENT , i.AMOUNT , m.PROFILEURL , m.PROFILE FROM (select * from post where postid= #{postId}) p JOIN ingredient i ON p.POSTID = i.POSTID JOIN members m ON p.USERID = m.USERID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(postid), 0) + 1 FROM post), #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{foodName}, #{content}, default, default, default,0,default)
